name: pages-editor
description: A customized Payload CMS editor for creating and managing federal websites

scripts.dev:prod: NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation rm -rf .next && pnpm build && pnpm start
scripts.reinstall: NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation rm -rf node_modules && rm pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm --ignore-workspace install
scripts.seed: yes | payload migrate:fresh && payload run scripts/seed.ts
scripts.dc:app:build: docker compose run --rm app npm run build
scripts.dc:build: docker compose build --build-arg BUILD_ENV=$(grep BUILD_ENV .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.dc:lint: docker compose run --rm app npm run lint
scripts.dc:gantry-build: docker compose run --rm site1 npm run build
scripts.dc:gantry-install: docker compose run --rm site1 npm ci
scripts.dc:generate:db-schema: docker compose run --rm app npm run generate:db-schema
scripts.dc:generate:importmap: docker compose run --rm app npm run generate:importmap
scripts.dc:generate:types: docker compose run --rm app npm run generate:types
scripts.dc:install: docker compose run --rm app npm ci
scripts.dc:migrate:create: docker compose run --rm app npx payload migrate:create
scripts.dc:migrate:down: docker compose run --rm app npx payload migrate:down
scripts.dc:migrate:fresh: docker compose run --rm app npx payload migrate:fresh
scripts.dc:migrate:status: docker compose run --rm app npx payload migrate:status
scripts.dc:migrate:up: docker compose run --rm app npx payload migrate
scripts.dc:seed: docker compose run --rm app npm run seed
scripts.dc:seed:data: docker compose run --rm app npx payload run scripts/seed.ts
scripts.dc:test: docker compose run --rm app npm run test
scripts.dc:test:ci: docker compose run --rm app npm run test:ci
